constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 111 (Friday, June 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SCHAKOWSKY:
H.R. 4186.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
The Congress shall have Power . . . To regulate Commerce
with foreign Nations, and among the several States, and with
the Indian Tribes.
[Page H3156]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Patriotic Corporations of America Act of 2021
